trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging>事件时的页导航按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Page") 在控件内单击时，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件处理的分页操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，每次此事件发生时取消的分页操作，例如。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 页导航按钮通常位于的页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DetailsViewPageEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DetailsViewPageEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
